languages.text: {n}Длинные и небольшие, глубокие и поверхностные, тонкие, изогнутые, рваные. Вы замечаете закономерность в их расположении и различаете расплывшиеся по неровной коже символы. Такие же носят на своих телах служители культа смерти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Длинные и небольшие, глубокие и поверхностные, тонкие, изогнутые, рваные. Вы замечаете закономерность в их расположении и различаете расплывшиеся по неровной коже символы. Такие же носят на своих телах служители культа смерти.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The scars all vary in length, width, depth, and shape. However, you notice a pattern in the way the scars are aligned, as well as a series of faded symbols on the man's rough skin. Death cultists bear similar marks on their bodies.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Длинные и небольшие, глубокие и поверхностные, тонкие, изогнутые, рваные. Вы замечаете закономерность в их расположении и различаете расплывшиеся по неровной коже символы. Такие же носят на своих телах служители культа смерти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The scars all vary in length, width, depth, and shape. However, you notice a pattern in the way the scars are aligned, as well as a series of faded symbols on the man's rough skin. Death cultists bear similar marks on their bodies.{/n}

{n}The scars vary greatly in length, width, depth, and shape. However, you notice a pattern in the way the scars are aligned, as well as a series of faded symbols on the man's skin. Death cultists bear similar marks on their bodies, except the man's wounds look old and long since healed.{/n}

{n}The scars all vary in length, width, depth, and shape. However, you notice a pattern in the way the scars are aligned, as well as a series of faded symbols on the man's rough skin. Death cultists bear similar marks on their bodies.{/n}

{n}The scars all vary in length, width, depth, and shape. However, you notice a pattern in the way the scars are aligned, as well as a series of faded symbols on the man's skin. Death cultists bear similar marks on their bodies, except that this man's wounds look old and long since healed.{/n}

{n}The scars all vary in length, width, depth, and shape. However, you notice a pattern in the way the scars are aligned, as well as a series of faded symbols on the man's rough skin. Death cultists bear similar marks on their bodies.{/n}

{n}The scars all vary in length, width, depth, and shape. However, you notice a pattern in the way the scars are aligned, as well as a series of faded symbols on the man's rough skin. Death cultists bear similar marks on their bodies.{/n}

{n}The scars all vary in length, width, depth, and shape. However, you notice a pattern in the way the scars are aligned, as well as a series of faded symbols on the man's rough skin. Death cultists bear similar marks on their bodies.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il y a des cicatrices de toutes les tailles et de toutes les formes. Vous remarquez néanmoins une certaine logique dans la manière dont elles sont alignées, ainsi qu'une série de symboles à moitié estompés. Vous avez déjà vu ce genre de marque sur les cultistes de la mort.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scars all vary in length, width, depth, and shape. However, you notice a pattern in the way the scars are aligned, as well as a series of faded symbols on the man's rough skin. Death cultists bear similar marks on their bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il y a des cicatrices de toutes les tailles et de toutes les formes. Vous remarquez néanmoins une certaine logique dans la manière dont elles sont alignées, ainsi qu'une série de symboles à moitié estompés. Vous avez déjà vu ce genre de marque sur les cultistes de la mort, sauf que dans le cas de cet homme, les plaies sont particulièrement anciennes et depuis longtemps refermées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las cicatrices presentan diversas longitudes, diámetros, profundidades y formas. Sin embargo, detectas un patrón en su trazado, así como una serie de símbolos ya desvaídos sobre su piel rugosa. Los adeptos de los cultos de la Muerte tienen estigmas similares en sus cuerpos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scars all vary in length, width, depth, and shape. However, you notice a pattern in the way the scars are aligned, as well as a series of faded symbols on the man's rough skin. Death cultists bear similar marks on their bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las cicatrices presentan diversas longitudes, diámetros, profundidades y formas. Sin embargo, detectas un patrón en su trazado, así como una serie de símbolos ya desvaídos sobre su piel. Los adeptos de los cultos de la Muerte tienen estigmas similares en sus cuerpos, aunque las heridas de este hombre son viejas y sanaron hace mucho.{/n}

languages.text: {n}傷跡の長さ、幅、深さ、形はすべて違う。しかし、傷跡の並び方にはパターンがあり、男の荒れた皮膚に色あせたシンボルが連なっていることに気づく。死のカルトの信者の体にも同じような傷跡がある。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scars all vary in length, width, depth, and shape. However, you notice a pattern in the way the scars are aligned, as well as a series of faded symbols on the man's rough skin. Death cultists bear similar marks on their bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}傷跡の長さ、幅、深さ、形はすべて違う。しかし、傷跡の並び方にはパターンがあり、男の皮膚に色あせたシンボルが連なっていることに気づく。死のカルトの信者の体にも同じような傷跡があるが、この男の傷は古く、ずっと昔に治っているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}伤疤的长度、宽度、深度、形状各不相同，但你留意到那些伤疤排列的方式，也注意到了那个男人粗糙皮肤上一系列褪色的符号。拜死教教徒身上也带着类似的印记。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scars all vary in length, width, depth, and shape. However, you notice a pattern in the way the scars are aligned, as well as a series of faded symbols on the man's rough skin. Death cultists bear similar marks on their bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伤疤的长度、宽度、深度、形状各不相同，但你留意到那些伤疤排列的方式，也注意到了那个男人皮肤上一系列褪色的符号。拜死教教徒身上也带着类似的印记，只不过眼前这个人的伤口似乎都是旧伤，很久以前就愈合了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Narben haben alle unterschiedliche Länge, Breite, Tiefe und Form. Dennoch bemerkst du ein Muster in ihrer Anordnung sowie mehrere verblasste Symbole auf der Haut des Mannes. Todeskultisten tragen ähnliche Zeichen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scars all vary in length, width, depth, and shape. However, you notice a pattern in the way the scars are aligned, as well as a series of faded symbols on the man's rough skin. Death cultists bear similar marks on their bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Narben haben alle unterschiedliche Länge, Breite, Tiefe und Form. Dennoch bemerkst du ein Muster in ihrer Anordnung sowie mehrere verblasste Symbole auf der Haut des Mannes. Todeskultisten tragen ähnliche Zeichen, nur dass diese hier alt aussehen und längst verheilt sind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tüm yara izleri; uzunluk, genişlik, derinlik ve şekil açısından farklılık gösteriyor. Ancak yara izlerinin hizalanma şeklinde bir motif ve adamın sert derisi üzerinde solmuş bir dizi sembol olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Ölüm tarikatı mensupları da bedenlerinde benzer izler taşır.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scars all vary in length, width, depth, and shape. However, you notice a pattern in the way the scars are aligned, as well as a series of faded symbols on the man's rough skin. Death cultists bear similar marks on their bodies.{/n}
